name: trello_bulk_create_cards
description: Create multiple Trello cards in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling trello_create_card multiple times. Pass card names as a comma-separated string.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: Trello list ID to create cards in

detailSteps.code: const cardName = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get('_n') || ''; const resp = await fetch('/1/cards?idList={{list_id}}&name=' + encodeURIComponent(cardName), { method: 'POST', credentials: 'same-origin' }); if (!resp.ok) return { status: 'error', name: cardName, error: resp.status }; const card = await resp.json(); return { status: 'created', name: card.name, id: card.id, url: card.shortUrl || '' }
detailSteps.name: create_result
detailSteps.label: Create card
